197786.「……ああ ワガハイだ。回収任務指令の\n 第２９１号にて 指定された民家に 到:
Yes, it is I. I have just arrived to the house
designated in Recovery Mission Directive
No. 291. I'm starting the mission now.

197787.「キミのことは 知っているよ。\n <pc>君。それがキミの名だ。:
I know who you are.
Your name is <pc>.

197788.「ワガハイを 追ってきたことも 知っている。\n 先を越されるとは 思っていなか:
I knew that you were pursuing me.
I didn't think you'd get ahead of me, though.

197790.「悪く 思わないでくれたまえ。\n キミに かまっている時間は ないのだよ。:
Don't take it personally.
I simply have no time for the likes of
you.

197793.「ほう……。もう 回復したか。\n さすが <pc>君というところだな。:
Hm... So you're back to normal now, eh?
I suppose I shouldn't have expected anything
less from you.

197794.「キミの用件は わかっている。\n ある少年に 頼まれて\n これを 届けにきた:
I know what you're after. A boy asked you to
deliver this to me, did he not?

197795.<pc>は ふところに入れておいた\nボンドルの手紙が なくなっていることに\n:
<pc> realizes that Bondor's Letter
they had tucked away had been stolen!

197796.「すまないが ワガハイは\n 弟子は取らないと 決めているのでね。:
Sorry, chap, but I've decided I will not be
taking any apprentices at this time.

197797.「この手紙の差出人には キミから\n 丁重に 断っておいてくれたまえ。:
Please tell the sender of this letter that I
have respectfully declined.

197799.オルフェアの町にいるボンドルに\n弟子入りの話が パクレ警部から\n断られてしま:
Return to Orphea to break the bad news
to Bondor about Inspector Pakul rejecting
his request for apprenticeship.

197800.「おい お前。さっきも ここに 来てたが\n もしや オレと同じで パクレの野郎:
Hey, you. You were here earlier, right?
Are you by chance trying to get that
Pakul guy to pay back a debt to you, too?

197801.<if_woman>「あっ お姉ちゃん。\n もしかして パクレ警部に 会えたの:
Oh! Were you able to meet Inspector
Pakul?<yesno><close>

197802.「……なんだ ちがうのか。\n 別の用事ってんなら オレには 関係ねえな。:
...Oh, you're not? I guess it's none of my
business what it is, then.

197804.「パクレ警部と 会ってきたって\n 思いっきり カオに 書いてあるよ！:
I can tell by your face that you DID meet
with him!

197805.「どっちにしても パクレの野郎なら\n 帰ってくる気配は ねえぜ。\n お前も:
Either way, I doubt that lousy Pakul will be
coming back here. You should probably
get goin' yourself.

197806.<if_woman>「よかった。お姉ちゃんなら\n きっと 見つけてくれるって: Yay! I knew you'd find him for me!

197807.「……それで ボクの手紙は 渡してくれたよね。\n 警部は なんて 言ってたの？:
So you gave him my letter, right?
So? What did he say?

197808.<pc>は ボンドルに\n弟子入りの話が パクレ警部から\n断られてしまったこと:
<pc> informs Bondor that Inspector
Pakul had turned down his request
for apprenticeship.

197809.「……うわ～。\n やっぱり ダメだったかあ。\n そんな気は してたんだけどね:
Ah... I knew there was no chance. I had a
feeling he would say no.

197810.「おいおい。パクレに弟子入りだと？\n そんなことを 考えていたのか。\n おか:
Hey, now. You really want to be apprentice to
that Pakul loser? You're a strange one...

197811.「もしかして パクレの野郎に\n どこかで 会ってきたってのかよ？: Did you happen to see that lowlife anywhere?

197812.<if_woman>「ねえ お姉ちゃん。参考までに\n パクレ警部が どこで 何:
Hey! Just for reference, can you tell me
everything you know about Pakul? Like where
he was, and what he was doing?

197813.<pc>は ボンドルに\nパクレ警部が ジュレットの町の酒場で\nしでかしたこと:
<pc> tells Bondor about what
Inspector Pakul had done in Julet's tavern.

197814.「はあ？ パクレの野郎が\n ジュレットの酒場で あばれてたってか？\n そいつ:
Huh? That good-for-nothing was causin'
trouble in Julet's tavern? That's news to
me.

197815.<if_woman>「ふ～ん。パクレ警部が\n 酒場の置き物を 壊しちゃって\n:
Hrrmm... So Inspector Pakul broke the tavern's
ornament, and you ended up paying for it.

197816.「でも なんで そんなことに なったのかな？\n 追いつめた犯人と 現場で格闘の:
But how did that happen, I wonder?
Maybe he got into a fight with some criminal
and it broke...or something.

197817.「それで その後 警部は どうしたのかな？: So what did he do after that?

197818.<pc>は ボンドルに\n王都カミハルムイ南の 民家の前で\nパクレ警部と会えた:
<pc> tells Bondor that they ran into
Inspector Pakul in front of a private
residence in the south part of Kamiharmui.

197819.「なにぃ？ あいつは今\n カミハルムイに いるってのか！？\n オレも 後で:
What...? He's in Kamiharmui right now?!
I might just have to make a stop there
later...

197820.<if_woman>「……ふんふん。警部は\n お姉ちゃんを 眠らせている間に\:
Mhm, mhm... He must've gone inside the house
while you were sleeping.

197821.「そして 何かを持って 出てきた……と。: And then he came outside holding something...

197822.「それ なんだろうね？\n もしかして その家は 凶悪な強盗犯のアジトで\n 盗:
I wonder what it could be? Maybe that house
was the hideout of a vicious thief, and he
went there to get back what they stole...?

197823.「……あっ。家宅捜査ってヤツじゃないかな。\n きっと 証拠品を押さえて\n 強:
Ah... I think that's a house search. He must
be trying to get enough evidence and catch
those thieves red-handed!

197824.「やっぱり パクレ警部は すごいなあ。\n ますます あこがれちゃった。:
Inspector Pakul sure is great...
The more I hear about him, the more I
admire him!

197825.「しかし よりによって カミハルムイかよ。\n あの辺りには あんまり 近寄りた:
But why Kamiharmui, of all places? I'd really
rather not go near there if I can help it...

197826.<if_woman>「弟子入りを断られたのは 残念だったけど\n お姉ちゃんが:
It's too bad I couldn't become his apprentice,
but I learned a lot about the Inspector thanks
to you!

197827.「本当に ありがとう。\n これ お礼だよ。受け取ってね！:
Thanks so much! Here, this is yours.
Take it!

197828.「でも ボク あきらめないよ。\n パクレ警部を追いかけて ぜったいに\n 弟子:
But I'm not giving up just yet! I'm gonna go
after him and become his apprentice for
sure!
